row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PRV.JOB.UNBIND_SERVICE@GENERIC
row.description: Unbind service instance from an application in Cloud Foundry

row.process:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.EXECUTION_ENVIRONMENT !------------------------------------------ LOGGING INPUT PARAMETERS ------------------------------------------ : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Authentication Token" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CF_AUTHTOKEN#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Application Name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CF_APP_NAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Service Name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CF_SERVICE_NAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
!------------------------------------------ PREPARE AUTH DETAILS ---------------------------------------------- :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.PREP_AUTHINFO
:IF &UC4RB_CF_RETCODE# = 0 ! -------------------------------------Building input parameters----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : SET &UC4RB_CF_UNBIND_SERVICE_CLA# ="cf unbind-service " ! Application name : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_CF_APP_NAME# : SET &UC4RB_CF_UNBIND_SERVICE_CLA# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CF_UNBIND_SERVICE_CLA#, "&UC4RB_CF_APP_NAME#")
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_CF_SERVICE_NAME# : SET &UC4RB_CF_UNBIND_SERVICE_CLA# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CF_UNBIND_SERVICE_CLA#, " &UC4RB_CF_SERVICE_NAME#")
!--- LOGGING CF COMMAND : PRINT "EXECUTING CF UNBIND SERVICE COMMAND: &UC4RB_CF_UNBIND_SERVICE_CLA#" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = STR_CAT( "EXECUTING CF UNBIND SERVICE COMMAND: ", &UC4RB_CF_UNBIND_SERVICE_CLA#) : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO ! ------------------------------------------ INVOKING CF COMMAND LINE ------------------------------------------ &UC4RB_CF_UNBIND_SERVICE_CLA# :ENDIF
!Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** UNBIND SERVICE ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** UNBIND SERVICE ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ ERROR HANDLING ---------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS

row.post_process: !------------------------------------------ UPDATE AUTH INFO INTO VARA OBJECT ------------------------------------------ : SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") : IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.UPDATE_AUTHINFO : ENDIF
